title: Summons a whale and a fun phrase
text: ohwhaley toy project still development. can install latest version GitHub :

title: Summons a whale and a fun phrase
text: ohwhaley contains one function . say() echo randomly chosen whale-themed phrase enjoyment. Alternatively, can supply phrase
